title: Stepping Beyond Intention
description: Beyond Intention is a transformational life tool that enable you to break through the stuck states, mental and emotional blocks between you and living a joyful life of purpose. Developed from years of personal experience and refined by my fellow Dreamers around the globe over years of mentoring, sharing and indeed personal growth, the paradigm augments a range of modalities as a framework for effecting deliberate, real and lasting change in your life.
author: Daniel Mangena
